abstract: For the last few days, a resort in Idaho has been awash in media bosses, tech entrepreneurs, bankers and the occasional sports star, as Allen & Company held its latest invitation-only gathering in Sun Valley. DealBook has a slide show.
snippet: For the last few days, a resort in Idaho has been awash in media bosses, tech entrepreneurs, bankers and the occasional sports star, as Allen & Company held its latest invitation-only gathering in Sun Valley. DealBook has a slide show.
lead_paragraph: For the last few days, a resort in Idaho has been awash in media bosses, tech entrepreneurs, bankers and the occasional sports star, as Allen & Company held its latest invitation-only gathering in Sun Valley. There was chatter about Twitter, some updates from AOL, and JPMorgan Chase‘s James B. Lee Jr. had some thoughts on the deal markets. And, of course, plenty of mogul sightings along the paths and by the duck pond.
